title: Unspecified error, check logs.....

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Getting an Unspecified Error - please check logs for more info thing whilst at 99% step 2/2.

first it gave me that error at step 2/2 around 30% downloaded

then it gave me that error at scanning files 33% around the 200-220 files scanned mark

after trying a repair - scan all files -

it now does this at 99% step 2/2


edit: currently trying to force an update as suggested on patching issues, will inform what happens next.
checked internet, even reset it, don't have a firewall that i know of affecting league.

edit 2: doing the next thing of the patching issues, last one failed again with unspecified error.

edit 3 : deleted the folder lol_launcher as instructed on the patching issues force repatch, since first ones didn't work, STILL got the error. always stuck at 99% step 2/2

at a loss here, nothing much i can do about it i guess...

i just wanna play :\


RESOLVED ISSUE:

i basically tried everything... 
but alas, i went to update my literal out of date AVG, which hasn't been active since 2014, it had no active components, nothing... was just there, i updated it, and now league works for me WOOHOO

edit: it also allowed my bnet launcher to work too, and discord finally is downloadable!

replies.body: Are you sure AVG is what was causing it? I"m having the same issues and am about to uninstall AVG totally and see if that will fix it. I've tried everything like you and am desparate.

yeah, soz for not checking this, been hamming in league/mc and a new game i found on steam duelyst.

but yeah, the cause is, as you found out, from AVG, i didn't unistall AVG, i just updated it, from 2014 version to 2015 for now, the 2014 version had NO ACTIVE components, yet still

stopped me from patching, it even went as far to stop my battle.net launcher from working, that was an error on battle.net's end though, they updated that, and since i don't use AVG anymore, i never cared to bother updating it, mainly only use pc to watch youtube/shows, or play games XD

Firewalls and Antivirus programs will often cause issues for patching, especially if they haven't been updated or temporarily uninstalled. I strongly recommend doing either of those and if you continue to have issues, work through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Issues with patching after 32% are almost always caused by a poor connection to the patching servers.

Let me know if you continue to have issues.

Yeah I uninstalled AVG and boom the patcher worked. I know its not a connection problem, I simply don't have connection problems through my internet. It's always on unless I haven't paid the bill thats the only time its off.
